replies.body: So Reav3 told me that you wrote The Voice from the Hearth. If that's true, then let me just say that it was fantastic! I loved every minute of it!

> [{quoted}](name=Kairoptra,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jpAYWZvE,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-08-22T20:08:21.425+0000)
>
> So Reav3 told me that you wrote The Voice from the Hearth. If that's true, then let me just say that it was fantastic! I loved every minute of it!

Thanks a lot :) It's really nice to hear these comments. I'm very glad you read the piece and enjoyed it :)
But is it the new champion from the teaser released a day ago?
Definitely not. There are no plans to make the Seal Sister. Her name has been forgotten, after all. I'm not sure Ornn knows what happened to her.

rip seal sister we haven't forgotten you

It would be cool to one day get a pantheon of freljord gods even ones that aren't champions

> [{quoted}](name=FauxSchizzle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jpAYWZvE,comment-id=000400020000,timestamp=2018-04-20T18:17:55.170+0000)
>
> Definitely not. There are no plans to make the Seal Sister. Her name has been forgotten, after all. I'm not sure Ornn knows what happened to her.

Yo! You’re a narrative writer yes? Please read my Ornn theory?! I’d really appreciate some feedback. 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/LxPnNkZb-huge-theory-the-freljord-shurima-mount-targon-and-the-void?show=flat
in my heart Urf will always be Seal sister, I don't care what you say

Urf is Urf
He's an old April Fools joke

Back in 2010 they teased him as a new champion, only for Warwick to kill him come April Fools 2010
There was no SEAL Sister... It was a translation error.
no it is SEAL Sister... i think the one that has a translation error is the MERMAID SISTER
wat, Urf is a Manatee m8
PLEASE tell me we'll finally get a thicc female champ. Even if it's in the form of a Seal!
Only other person I can think of is nami but it's unlikely
